meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sluggish or slow in movement or reaction.
meanings.sent1: Her lumpishness was evident as she struggled to keep up with the others during the race.
meanings.sent2: His lumpishness in the morning made it hard for him to get out of bed.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lumpishness, he managed to finish the task before anyone else.
meanings.sent4: The car moved with the lumpishness of a tired old turtle.
meanings.sent5: The lumpishness of the sloth was a stark contrast to the agility of the cheetah.

meanings.definition: A dull or unresponsive attitude or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The student's lumpishness in class indicated a lack of interest in the subject.
meanings.sent2: Her lumpishness at the party made it clear she would rather be somewhere else.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lumpishness, he managed to crack a smile at the joke.
meanings.sent4: The lumpishness of the crowd dampened the excitement of the event.
meanings.sent5: The lumpishness of the sloth was a stark contrast to the energy of the squirrel.
